info.name: Whatsapp Dark Mode 2.0
info.description: This style changes the design of the web app version of whatsapp. It makes the app have a more consistent design and doesn't have a max screen resolution, smartly adapting the design dependent on the size of the screen.
info.additionalInfo:
HOW TO SET IT UP:
To get started install the style and make sure the theming is set to dark mode. Because of the way I have configured it, the style should only be put on if you want only dark mode not auto. Also make sure that the chat background is set to default.
If you find any places where it isn't consistent let me know.
